Plot: Simon Templar (Val Kilmer) is one of the world's top thieves and an expert in disguise. Simon's job is
to obtain a formula from a beautiful scientist Emma Russel (Elisabeth Shue) who has developed cold fusion. Stealing the formula requires Simon to unexpectedly fall in love with Emma during the heist. Now that the plan has fallen short of the Russian Mafia's expectations who hired Simon for his clandestine services he must work out the formula and save the U.S.
